channel.title: Left4Dead on David Amador
channel.description: Recent content in Left4Dead on David Amador

item.title: New Graphic Card and psu
item.description: I decided to buy another a new graphic card. I got tired of my old Geforce 8500 GT sloweness. It was slow on 3dsmax, it was slow on recent games and most of all I have this thing for Ati so this was never my favorite. After some research I decided to get a XFX Ati Radeon 4890, most of the reviews were positive and its placed in a mid-range pricing.
